summary: In 1944, during the Warsaw uprising against the Nazis, Polish Lieutenant Zadra and his resistance fighters use Warsaw's sewer system to escape the German encirclement.
cast: Teresa Izewska|Tadeusz Janczar|Wienczyslaw Glinski|Tadeusz Gwiazdowski|Stanislaw Mikulski|Emil Karewicz|Vladek Sheybal|Teresa Berezowska|Zofia Lindorf|Janina Jablonowska|Maria Kretz|Jan Englert|Kazimierz Dejunowicz|Zdzislaw Lesniak|Maciej Maciejewski|Adam Pawlikowski|Wlodzimierz Bednarski|Ryszard Filipski|Wladyslaw Kowalski|Kazimierz Kutz|Ewa Wisniewska|Tomasz Witt
title: Kanal
